processPoint.description: The location where the information was generated. (Siehe Anlagen Bezeichnungskonzept)

itemId.description: The id of the mailpiece assigned by the sorting machine during sorting.

mailpieceId.description: Represents the national identifier for the mailpiece item.

dischargeReason.description: Reason of discharge. Only relevant for discharge events.

description: The track event of an parcel. The event will be used for statistic purpose.
